mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shangpin_order_uuid_number as shangpinOrderUuidNumber ,a.address_id as addressId ,a.shangpin_id as shangpinId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.buy_number as buyNumber ,a.shangpin_order_true_price as shangpinOrderTruePrice ,a.shangpin_order_courier_name as shangpinOrderCourierName ,a.shangpin_order_courier_number as shangpinOrderCourierNumber ,a.shangpin_order_types as shangpinOrderTypes ,a.shangpin_order_payment_types as shangpinOrderPaymentTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
